articles.title: JSW Steel Q1 Results: Profit falls 64% YoY to Rs 845 crore, misses estimates - The Economic Times
articles.description: JSW Steel Q1 Results: Revenue from operations in the June quarter increased 2% year-on-year to Rs 42,943 crore. EBITDA for the reporting quarter fell 22% YoY to Rs 5,510 crore, while margins declined 390 basis points to 12.8%.
